languages.text: {n}Свирепая гримаса искажает лицо воина, делает его похожим на звериную морду.{/n} "И я буду мстить. Клянусь кровью и клыками! Тысячей нечистых сердец буду я пировать, прославляя павших товарищей!"

{n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"
languages.original_text: {n}Свирепая гримаса искажает лицо воина, делает его похожим на звериную морду.{/n} "И я буду мстить. Клянусь кровью и клыками! Тысячей нечистых сердец буду я пировать, прославляя павших товарищей!"

traits.locale_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of tainted hearts!"

{n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of tainted hearts!"

{n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of tainted hearts!"

{n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

languages.text: {n}乌尔法脸上露出了恶毒、狰狞的表情，看起来仿佛野兽一样。{/n}“我要为他们报仇！我以鲜血和獠牙发誓，我必将为他们报仇！我要将荣耀带给我死去的战友们！我挖出成千上万颗恶魔的心脏，大快朵颐！”
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法脸上露出了恶毒、狰狞的表情，看起来仿佛野兽一样。{/n}“我要为他们报仇！我以鲜血和獠牙发誓，我必将为他们报仇！我要将荣耀带给我死去的战友们！我要在成千上万颗邪恶的心脏之间大快朵颐！”

languages.text: {n}Una mueca salvaje retuerce la cara del guerrero, dándole una apariencia bestial.{/n} «¡Y los vengaré! ¡Por la sangre y por el colmillo, los vengaré! ¡Glorificaré a mis hermanos de batalla caídos devorando miles de corazones de esos engendros!».
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Una mueca salvaje retuerce la cara del guerrero, dándole una apariencia bestial.{/n} «¡Y los vengaré! ¡Por la sangre y por el colmillo, los vengaré! ¡Glorificaré a mis hermanos de batalla caídos devorando miles de corazones mancillados!».

languages.text: {n}その戦士は、まるで獣のような印象を与える凶暴な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「そして俺は復讐する！血と牙で復讐する！倒れた戦闘同胞たちを讃え、何千もの汚れた悪の心臓を贄としてやるのだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}その戦士は、まるで獣のような印象を与える凶暴な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「そして俺は復讐する！血と牙で復讐する！倒れた戦闘同胞たちを讃え、何千もの汚れた心臓を贄としてやるのだ！」

languages.text: {n}Das Gesicht des Kriegers verzieht sich zu einer wilden Grimasse, die ihn wie ein Untier aussehen lässt.{/n} "Und ich werde mich rächen! Beim Blut und beim Reißzahn, ich werde mich rächen! Meine gefallenen Kampfbrüder werde ich ehren, an Tausenden Schurkenherzen werde ich mich laben!"
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gesicht des Kriegers verzieht sich zu einer wilden Grimasse, die ihn wie ein Untier aussehen lässt.{/n} "Und ich werde mich rächen! Beim Blut und beim Reißzahn, ich werde mich rächen! Meine gefallenen Kampfbrüder werde ich ehren, an tausenden verderbter Herzen werde ich mich laben!"

languages.text: {n}La rage déforme le visage du guerrier, lui donnant une apparence bestiale.{/n} « Et j'aurai ma vengeance ! Par le sang et les crocs, je l'aurai ! Je couvrirai de gloire mes frères de bataille tombés en dévorant des milliers de cœurs démoniaques ! »
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La rage déforme le visage du guerrier, lui donnant une apparence bestiale.{/n} « Et j'aurai ma vengeance ! Par le sang et les crocs, je l'aurai ! Je couvrirai de gloire mes frères de bataille déchus en dévorant des milliers de cœurs corrompus ! »

languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

languages.text: {n}Savaşçının yüzünde sert bir ifade beliriyor ve canavar gibi gözükmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "İntikamlarını alacağım! Kan ve diş adına alacağım! Düşmüş savaşdaşlarım yükselecek, binlerce ifritin kalbiyle ziyafet çekecek!"
languages.original_text: {n}A vicious grimace twists the warrior's face, giving it a beast-like appearance.{/n} "And I will have vengeance! By blood and by fang I will have it! My fallen battle-brothers I will glorify, feasting on thousands of fiends' hearts!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Savaşçının yüzünde sert bir ifade beliriyor ve canavar gibi gözükmesine sebep oluyor.{/n} "İntikamlarını alacağım! Kan ve diş adına alacağım! Düşmüş savaş dostlarım yükselecek, binlerce ifritin kalbiyle ziyafet çekecek!"
